text: Okara Cantonment railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Okara cantonment, 10 km away from Okara city, Okara district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==Train Crash== On September 29, 1957, a Karachi-bound express passenger train collided at full speed with a stationary oil-tanker train before midnight, on Gambar Railway Station. 300 people were killed and 150 wounded by the accident. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Okara District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Okara Cantonment railway station
